entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor template first link fills whole horizontal space inside top-row #44133
  • (Http)(Validation)ProblemDetails converters should obey JsonOptions.JsonNamingPolicy #44132
  • Checkbox is not checked when the bound value is true and if the input type is set by code #44130
  • [Blazor Server] Blazor Server Freezes When Opening A New Tab #44124
  • Duende.IdentityServer from Blazor WebAssembly App protecting ASP.NET Core API using Client Credentials with custom allowed scope - invalid_scope #44122
  • `dotnet-getdocument` fails to resolve GetDocument.Insider for net7.0 #44119
    7.0.0
  • Add an Analyzer to recommend using DIM properties with IHeaderDictionary instead of indexer #44116

Closed

  • Quarantine ApplicationInitializationPageIsRequested #42658
    Test failures
  • Quarantine EnableCoreHostTraceLogging_PipeCaptureNativeLogs #42913
    Test failures
  • Quarantine FrameworkNotFoundExceptionLogged_File #43087
    Test failures
  • Quarantine EnableCoreHostTraceLogging_FileCaptureNativeLogs #42820
    Test failures
  • Opensource but why has not source? #44101
    Discussions
  • Swagger method with empty body for grpc get request #42407
    7.0.0
  • Razor Pages 404 after updating to ASP.NET Core 7 RC1 #44002
  • New endpoints exposed by OpenAPI documentation compared to before ASP.NET Core 7 RC1 #44005
    7.0.0
  • Blazor Wasm ASP.NET Core Hosted IWebHostEnvironment.WebRootPath null when debugging #44110
  • This is by design. `FromBody` uses serializers such as Newtonsoft.Json which have a different feature set compared to model binding. Model binding - indicated by `FromQuery`, `FromRoute` etc, requires that complex types have a parameterless constructor. #44006
  • [Loc]With net6 preview 7 installed on locale OS, some template names are unlocalized after runing "dotnet new --list" in CLI #34412
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_actix, https #43999
  • Perf regression: endpoint #44097
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #44103
  • Blazor wasm .NET 6 rc2 unable to use RegisterForJavaScript RootComponents when publishing #38044

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix up packaging for Extensions.ApiDescription.Server #44136
    Servicing-consider, area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-rc2
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc2' => 'release/7.0' #44135
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/7.0] Update spa-templates to ref new 7.0 branch #44134
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, feature-spa, feature-templates, 7.0.0
  • Fix up packaging for Extensions.ApiDescription.Server #44129
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, 7.0.0
  • Update BuildFromSource docs to be more scenario focused #44127
    Docs, area-infrastructure
  • Add header dictionary analyzer and fixer #44123
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Fix item template `groupIdentity` and `identity` values #44121
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, area-grpc, feature-templates, 7.0.0
  • Try Win11 arm queue #44118
    area-infrastructure
  • Try Silicon arm helix queue #44117
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Unquarantine IIS tests affected by reverted dispose fix #44126
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0-rc2] Fix item template `groupIdentity` and `identity` values #44120
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, area-grpc, feature-templates, 7.0-rc2
  • Updating the SDK, hopefully fixing template tests #44087
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Retry template tests due to current publish flakiness #44137
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2001161 #43956
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Roslyn versions #44072
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0.0
  • Input components two way binding + InputBase handling of unparsable inputs #40326
    area-blazor, community-contribution, .NET 8 Planning
  • Use perfect-hash in HttpUriScheme.GetKnownMethod(string) instead of trie #44096
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Fix DetectMisplacedLambdaAttribute analyzer and tests #44061
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Change gRPC JSON to only accept top-level field as request body #44055
    Servicing-consider, area-grpc, 7.0.0
  • Add RequestDelegate analyzer #44048
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime
  • Fix the IsKnownImmutableType method to return true for enum types #42901
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Route tooling redux #44077
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Add IgnoreQueryString parameter to NavLink #40990
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Fix flaky HTTP/2 test #41181
    area-runtime
  • Resume the IIS state machine on the thread pool #41271
    area-runtime
